CONTRACT_ID: IM/IT Professional services for ATSSC - TBIPS
department: Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada
short_summary: IM/IT Professional services for ATSSC - TBIPS
description: The Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada (ATSSC) is responsible for providing support services to twelve (12) federal administrative tribunals by way of a single, integrated organization. The Information Services & Solutions Team (ISST) requires the services of IM/IT professional resources on an \"as and when requested\" basis to assist with temporary projects within the organization. The ATSSC manages multiple projects to deliver solutions to the federal administrative tribunals. In support of the Tribunals mandate to deliver access to Justice, the ISST is implementing new websites, e-filing systems and courts and registry systems for the tribunals based on Filemaker Pro technology. It is the desire of ATSSC to avoid reliance on contractors by ensuring knowledge transfer to employees, reducing customization to reduce the complexity of future upgrades, encouraging standard business practices, and facilitating adoption of native workflow, and paperless transactions.
tags: Security Threat and Risk Assessment Analyst
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: IM/IT Professional Services for ATSSC – TBIPS

**Solicitation Number:** 20222812
**Tender Title:** IM/IT Professional services for ATSSC – TBIPS

**Pre-qualified Suppliers Invited to Submit Bids**

The Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada (ATSSC) is seeking proposals from pre-qualified contractors to provide IM/IT professional services for various projects within the organization. The Selected Suppliers will provide resources on an "as and when required" basis to support temporary projects related to software development and implementation for various federal tribunals.

**Professional Services Required:**

* Level 3 Business Consultant
* Level 3 Business Systems Analyst
* Level 3 Business Transformation Architect
* Level 3 IT Security Threat and Risk Assessment and Certification and Accreditation Analyst

**Pre-qualified Suppliers Invited to Bid:**

The following contractors have been invited to bid on this project:
 
- Accenture Inc.
- Adirondack Information Management Inc. (in joint venture with Amita Corporation, Artemp Personnel Services Inc., and The AIM Group Inc.)
- Alika Internet Technologies Inc.
- ALITHYA CANADA INC
- DOLOMITE - PUR – PHIRELIGHT – SPHYRNA IN JV
- ESIT Canada Enterprise Services Co (in joint venture with ESIT Canada Services AuxEntreprises Cie)
- Integra Networks Corporation
- IPSS INC.
- iVedha Inc.
- Leverage Technology Resources Inc.
- Malarsoft Technology Corporation
- MALARSOFT TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION
- Quallium Corporation
- Samson & Associés CPA/Consultation Inc
- Sierra Systems Group Inc.

**Requirements:**

- Common PS SRCL #06 applies
- Security rating of Information Management Certificate level (IMC) 
- The Contractor must comply with the requirements of the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement (SA)
- The Contractor will comply with the requirements specified in the Notice to Suppliers documents.

**Proposal Submission**

Prospective bidders must submit their proposals on the Government of Canada's Shared Services Canada electronic tendering system. Documents will be available on the system from May 01, 2023 to the submission deadline of May 16, 2023, at 16:00:00.

For more information, please contact Veronica Ross by phone at (343) 596-7267, or by email at procurements-achats@tribunal.gc.ca
